Posts.Content: My mom was diagnosed w/breast cancer about 3 1/2 yrs ago. She went through chemo and radiation on and off b/c of her high blood pressure and heart problems. Well just 2 days ago i found out that the Dr's found two more lumps in her right and left breast. Im scared to find out what that means?  I have no father, sisters or brother. All i have is her. Im still young, and scared she wont be there for the important things in my life ex"wedding, kids ect...  All i know is that she was b/w stages 1 and 2. I cant eat, sleep, and constantly cry when ever im alone.  I dont know what to do. If anyone as anything to share w/ me i would be soo grateful. ANd for everyone who is going through cancer or has a loved one i will keep yall in my prayers. God Bless.
Posts.Title: My moms breast cancer came back, what's going to happen?

Posts.Content: Sarah, thank you so much for responding. Im so sorry for your loss. I cant believe it was only a wk ago and what you are going through. The think w/ my mom is that she doesnt want anyone to know what she is going through and dosent what me to worry. I had to find out everything from my aunt who also lives w/us. She told me that my mom is more scared of the double dose of chemo and rad treatment again then anything. My aunt said it hurt her so much that she would fall asleep w/ tears rolling down her check. It hurt to know my mom was in that much pain and now she has to go through it again, twice as more. Also whats sad it that she has always had a rough life support me by her self. If i could i wish i had the cancer and not her.  I always wondered why her?  We have no one in our familly that has any kind of cancer? I just hope god dosent take her from me anytime soon. I feel she's not ready to go and im not ready to say goodbye. I just hope god has been listening to my prayers. Well thank you and i send you my best wishes to you and your new son.
Posts.Title: My moms breast cancer came back, what's going to happen?

Posts.Content: Hi ashley. sounds like we have alot in common. My mom was dx in 04 and it came back this yr/january in her lymph node(above collar bone). She had to take chemo and radiation again. Was approved for tykerb in march. Pet and cat scan in june. Her oncologist said it looked good. That the cancer in her lymph nodes dont look like it's getting bigger. They had to take her off chemo/rad early last week due to her high blood pressure/heart problems. Also cut her med(tykerb) in 1/2. We are kinda relieved that she wont have to go to the hospital as much which was about 3 times a wk and the hospital is 40min away:( But also scared that since she is stopping everything early, does that mean the cancer can spread faster if its not being treated??? Also the chemo was causing her nail infection/numbness of her feet and fingers/cant taste anything and bleeding of the gums in her mouth. i know exactly how you feel when you think that this is not fair and that it hurts to see her like this. Sometimes i wish it was me and not her. And it has brought our familly closer but we always been really close b/c we are a small family that live within 10 miles of  eachother. It's really hard for me b/c she is my only parent and i constantly worry about her and can concentrate in school /work/ or my own relationship. Thank god my boyfriend has always been supportive and understanding. There are plenty of moments were i just feel like crying and he is there to hold me and cry together. Sometimes crying just feels good.. If you ever need to talk please send private messege. I would love to talk and help relieve the pain we all are going through. Hana
Posts.Title: Help. Its my mom...

Posts.Content: My mom has had breast cancer for about 3 yrs now. She has gone through chemo and radiation. During chemo she had lost her hair and went through some depression. Also she has had some problems with her heart. B/C of her heart problems she had to stop chemo on and off. My biggest worry though is her Dr. thinks she might have another lump in her breast and if so what does that mean? I know it means the cancer has come back, but does she have to go through chemo again or does it mean she is going to DIE fro m this now? It worries me so much that im scared to find out the answer to this:( I cant sleep, eat or concentrate on anything. I cry evernite when im alone. My mom is the only parent I have, and i dont know what i would do w/ out her. Please, if anyone has anything to share with me i would be so grateful. Thank you
Posts.Title: i am so Scared For my Mom!!!

Posts.Content: On 12/7/2006 Linda Lou wrote: Dear Hana, Please get the information that you need from your mother's doctor. Not knowing the facts exactly as they are will cause you more stress and grief. This is not the place to get medical advice but definately the place to get support. I know how afraid you must be right now. Talk to your family and friends and especially your mom. Life would go on even without your mom but cherish each moment with her. Even if the lump is another cancer I am sure they will treat it promptly. Just make sure that you and your mom are very involved with her health care and educate yourself as much as possible. The book "Living Through Breast Cancer" by Carolyn M. Kaelin, M.D., M.P.H. is a wonderful resource written by an oncologist breast cancer survivior. Best of luck to you and your mom. Linda Lou     Hi Linda, Thank you for responding .  I have tried contacting my mom's Dr. but the receptionist says she is always unavailable at the time. Finally i sat down with my mom and asked her what exactly is going on cause i need to know and im very scared for her. Well she said her Dr. was just checking around her breast when she felt something unnormal around her port, so she recommend my mom to see her surgery Dr. to check. Well my mom went there asap. She told me that her surgery Dr. thinks it might be some dead tissue around her port and she shouldnt really worry about anything. Plus she just had a full exam about 3 mths ago and everything was OK. So im keeping my fingers crossed. I dont really know how many stages there is, my mom said 4 and that she is b/w the beginning and middle. Is that bad? B/c of her stage she said they put her on some new med that my cause side effects like heart problems wich she has had alot thats why she's not completely finish w/her treatment. Well thank you gotta go back to work. If you have any more advise for me I would be very thankful.  Hana
Posts.Title: i am so Scared For my Mom!!!

Posts.Content: thank you all for your concern, but just an hour ago i found out that my mom breast cancer did come back. They had found two lumps. one in one and one in the other. I dont know what to do now? I just cant stop cring. Im scared to know what that means? Does it mean she is more likey to die? I dont know how im going to continue with my day at work or the next day until i find out whats going to happen. If anyone knows any information i would deeply apreciate it. Thank You HANA
Posts.Title: i am so Scared For my Mom!!!

Posts.Content: Thanks michelle and tracy. Well im about to go w/ my mom to see her onocologist to talk about her situation and new tx. All i know is that the cancer came back in her neck lymph node and two cancer lumps in her chest. Its wierd b/c  her original cancer was on her left underarm(one lumph node) and one lump under her left breast(lumpectomy). She is also complaining of pain in the back of her neck, like something is pulling and pain in her left arm joints. I hope it hasnt spread to her joints or brain? God this is the most scariest day of my life. Ive been shaking since last night before i went to sleep. Well were about to go now to see her Dr. Wish us luck and I will keep in touch. Hana
Posts.Title: i am so Scared For my Mom!!!

Posts.Content: Hi leahchey, my name is hana and i know exactly what your going through. My mom's cancer came back in jan after 2 1/2 yrs of tx. Found out that it came back in her lymph node above her collar bone. They removed it but her oncologist said when cancer comes back in the lymph  node that means it can spread b/c its a blood stream. thats why its not curable but the tx they do is more chemo and radiation to help control the cancer from spreading or to shrink the cancer. My mom has already started tx. Also that are mom will always have to have tx for the rest of there lives until unless it has spread to much. But just a mth ago i believe the FDA has just approved a med called tykerb thats just for recurrent breast cancer pt's like our mom. It supposed to trigger only the cancer cells and not the good ones. Ask her oncologist about it. Dont forget though that it just got approved so it's still basically a trial, not a 100% sure. You can look it up on google. There are some side effects like high blood pressure, diahrreah and some others. Well good luck, Ill keep your mom in my prayer
Posts.Title: cancer reaccurence

Posts.Content: Hi amy and fighter, I feel im in the same boat as yall are. My mom was diagnosed w/ BC 2 yrs ago. was on chemo and radiation on and off b/c of heart problems to heriscptin(sp?). She cant take it now. well 01/03/07 we found out that it spread to her lymph node above her collar bone. also some lymph nodes in her chest. well 2 days ago she had surgery to remove the lymph node in her neck but her oncologist said they cant remove the ones in her chest b/c they are so tiny. Did brain MRI(came out NEG). Next week she has a bone and spine scan b/c she complains of pain in the back of her neck and pain all over her right arm(bone). They said it hasnt spread to her lung, liver ex...but im scared it has to the bone or spine.Im also confused on how serious it is and what is the survival rate? I have no sisters or brothers and she raised me not my dad, im 25. So all i have is her and im so scared!!!!  I tend to scry everytime im alone, either in the car or home. I think i just need some good news. I heard the survival rate for mestatic disease is that %20 only live past 5 yrs!! God i hope thats not true. well if yall find out anything let me know, and vice versa. thx
Posts.Title: Breast to lung to bone

Posts.Content: My mom b/c came back and so she has to take chemo and radiation again but my concern is that i dont think her body can handle it because of her body weight. She is 5 ft nothing and now weights 89lbs. She doesnt look healthy. My familly and I have been tring foods that are good for her but she wont eat?  All she eats everyonce in awhile is bread. Does anyone have any advise? Thanks Hana
Posts.Title: Loss of appetite

Posts.Content: Hi Bonnie, My name is hana, and my mom was just put on this new med too. I think i know just as much as you do. But if either one of us finds out anything new about it then i will inform you and vice versa. Take care. Hana
Posts.Title: Tykerb

Posts.Content: Does anyone know of any food to eat that's good for metastatic BC? I heard apricot seed(boiled) is good. My mom has the cancer and her appitite is not that good, she is "5,0 and is about 89lbs now!!  I need some good nutrition advise please! Thank you  Oh Yeah, is coffee and white rice bad? Concerned daughter :/
Posts.Title: nutrition

Posts.Content: My mom is currently going through chemo again do to recurrent BC. We were told that she will loss her hair again. The problem is that she lost her only wig that was given to her by a friend. I heard there expensive!!  Does anyone know where i could get one thats ok in price. I live in Atl, GA if that helps.  Thanks
Posts.Title: Where can i find a wig?

Posts.Content: My mom's bc came back in her lymph node in her neck(above collar bone) and tiny ones in her chest. The one in her neck was removed but the ones in her chest cant be reoved. Her oncologist said only chemo and rad can control it. so far  no sign of spreading. What also sucks is that she cant take hericeptin b/c of her heart. The oncologist said they are waiting for a new drug that might come out in about 2-3 mths. Does anyone know the survival rate of this disease? Any info would be gratefully apreciated, thx Hana(scared daughter)
Posts.Title: survival rate on met?

Posts.Content: My mom has medicaid and she said she dosent have to pay for anything. I guess it depends on your mom's insurance?
Posts.Title: Avastin and Abraxane info please?

Posts.Content: Hi my mom was dx in 04 for bc. this yr 01/07 her canver came back in her lymph node above her collar bone. was put on chemo again and radiation. In march she was approved for tykerb. Due to her high blood pressure and heart problem she had to cut her tykerb in 1/2 and stop her chemo/radiation a little early. Her oncologist siad she cant have radiation anymore. I guess my ? is " B/c she canr have radiation anymore does that mean the cancer cane grow faster"? Dosent radiation control the cancer/tumor? So far i know her last ct and petscan looked beautiful is what her oncologist said b/c it hasnt spread and looks smaller. If anyone has any advise i would appreciate it. im scared it means that they cant do anymore for her and its going all down hill from her. I feel helpless for my mom. She is so tired and im tired of worrying for her. She is the only parent i have and love her more then anything. Its hard worrying and keeping her in my mind 24/7 while working full time and going to school full time. cant concentrate. Please, any advise or comment would be grate thank you.
Posts.Title: concern for mom after chemo,need help please!

Posts.Content: I would appreciate if anyone knew what it means if the cancer comes back in the lymp nodes(neck above collar bone)? Can it be removed and how dangerous is it? Also, can cancer be moveable and change in size? And If the catscan/petscan shows the cancer light pink instead of bright red, is that still considerd cancer?  If anyone knows anything I would be very grateful.  Thank you.  Daughter of BC mom.
Posts.Title: Can anyone help me w/ a ?

Posts.Content: My mom was just put on these two meds b/c her breast cancer came back and now she has to do chemo and radiation again. It came back in her lymph node(above collor bone). Her oncologist said that they did all the test to see if it had spread but it had not, only a little in her chest near her lungs but they are very tiny. Thank God. I would greatly appreciate if anyone has evey heard or been put on these two meds. Thank you  Hana.  OH!!   HAPPY VALENTINE TO ALL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Posts.Title: Avastin and Abraxane info please?

Posts.Content: My mom was just put on it last wk.  Its a new med that was just approved by the FDA for metastatic breast cancer pt's. Just wondered if anyone has any info about this new med?
Posts.Title: Anyone taking new med called tykerb?

Posts.Content: Hi marlo, thanks for responding. Well my mom had the lymph node removed about a wk ago and the biopsy came back positive. And they also found some in her chest but very little cancer lymph nodes(cant remove). This week she had a Mri on her brain and spine, Came out ok. Bone scan was ok too but they found some little ones in her lung now. Her oncologist said they think with chemo and radiation it might keep it under control. I just hope it dosent spread anywere else. I also heard some people live for 2-5 yrs also but my moms Dr. said that they dont think that is the case for my mom. When i heard that i just couldnt stop cring, i was so relieved :) I kept cring out loud"THANK YOU GOD!!!!" Well thats all that been happening, Please let me know how your cat scan came out, i hope good news. GOD BLESS    Hana
Posts.Title: mom's cancer came back in 3 differ places, what will they do?

Posts.Content: I have a couple messages out now regarding my moms condission since the beginning of the month. Well after the ultrasound, mammogram, catscan and petscan they now have the results. They said normally when the catscan finds cancer then it would show up bright red, well they said they found 3 light pink ones on my mom( one in the neck and two in the chest area). So they dont know why it came out that color but they said that there about 95% sure its cancer , but to make sure she has to have a biopsy.  Also i thought cancer lymph nodes are not suppose to move? Well the one in my moms neck moves and the docter said when cancer comes back it normally comes back in the neck or under arm.  Plus my mom has been having alot of headaches and feels like something is pulling something in the back of her neck?  Im so worried now more then ever!!  Ive been in another world for wks now.  And all my poor mom can worry is, how is she going to be able to work?  If anyone has anything to share w/ me, please do b/c i feel i cant talk to anyone but people on this website. Thank you
Posts.Title: mom's cancer came back in 3 differ places, what will they do?

Posts.Content: Hi leah and sonia, my name is hana, My mom was diagnosed in 04. She also is all i have. We found out that it came back in her lymph njode/neck in january. She started chemo again then found out that the FDA approved of a new med called tykerb. tykerb is for moms like ours(recurrent breast cancer pt). The only main side affect is problems, high blood pressure and diarriah. The prblem with my mom is that she already has high blood pressure and heart problems. She tells me she's ok but i can tell she's not. She looks 20 yrs older, her face is always pale, her appitite isnt good(5"0/87lbs), and she smokes. Also she work full time as a head server and wont QUIT .  I know the $ isnt the problem. Its hard to think she wont be there when i get married or have my own children. I think of her everyday and probrably cry everytime im alone. Its hard to think i cant do much to help her. All i can do is pray that she will get better. I will pray for ya'lls mom too because we all are in the same boat. And i feel what your going through, just hang in there and spend as much time with her b/c you never know. Treat everyday w/her as i was your  last. Much love, Hana
Posts.Title: its back

Posts.Content: My mom complains of mouth soreness and swelling. Could this be side effects od chemo? Also she has mouth sores when she eats spicey foods and her tounge gets sore? I would appriciate any advise. Thank you/
Posts.Title: side effects?
